State the organization's risk management objectives and review them annually or when significant changes occur.

| Objective | Scope | Review trigger |
|---|---|---|
| | | |

### GV.RM-02: Risk appetite and tolerance <a data-external href="/docs/functions/govern/risk-management-strategy#gvrm-02-risk-appetite-and-tolerance"><SquareArrowOutUpRight size={14} /></a>

Define risk appetite per product and threat area.

| Area | Appetite | Tolerance | Rationale |
|---|---|---|---|
| | | | |

---

### GV.RM-03: Enterprise risk integration <a data-external href="/docs/functions/govern/risk-management-strategy#gvrm-03-enterprise-risk-integration"><SquareArrowOutUpRight size={14} /></a>

Ensure cybersecurity risks are managed alongside other enterprise risks rather than in isolation.

---

| Severity | Response | Conditions |
|---|---|---|
| | | |

| Audience | Format | Cadence |
|---|---|---|
| | | |

Define a standardized method for scoring risks using likelihood x impact = severity.

| | Impact: Critical | Impact: High | Impact: Medium | Impact: Low |

| Opportunity | Risk accepted | Benefit | Conditions |
